member.name: M:Microsoft.Office.Server.Search.Connector.BDC.StructuredRepositorySystemUtility`1.ExecuteStatic(Microsoft.BusinessData.MetadataModel.IMethodInstance,Microsoft.BusinessData.MetadataModel.ILobSystemInstance,System.Object[],Microsoft.BusinessData.Runtime.IExecutionContext)
member.summary: Executes a MethodInstance in the model against the specified external system instance with given parameters.
member.param: The external system instance which the method instance is being executed against.

Parameters of the method. The size of the parameter array is equal to the number of parameter objects in the method, and the values are going to be passed in order. Out and return parameters will be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
ExecutionContext in which this execution is happening. This value will be null if ExecutionContext is not created.

member.summary: Specifies proxy server information for the proxy.

The proxy server name for the proxy.
The list of addresses that bypass the proxy server.
